Class PiccrossModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • piccross.PiccrossModel

  • public class PiccrossModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will have all the logic related to our game which will intact with view

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(int debugMode)
        This method will setup the gridPanel which will hold the hints and grid boxes.
        Parameters:
        debugMode - used to indicate either to generate random games or predefinded games.

      • sendGameToServer

        public void sendGameToServer()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addHints

        public void addHints()

      • setupHints

        public void setupHints()
        This method will setup hints for our game depending on what is inside random generated boxes.

      • showSolution

        public void showSolution()
        This method will show the correct boxes with changing the background of box to green. If we run the same method again it will go back to original color which means solution will go away.

        public javax.swing.JPanel getGridPanel()
        This method is a getter for or gridPanel which will be used in view.

      • isShowSolution

      • getPointTextField

        public javax.swing.JTextField getPointTextField()
        This method is a getter for pointTextField.
        Returns:
        pointTextField which will represent the space in UI which will hold the points for the user.

      • setMark

        public void setMark(boolean mark)
        This method is setter which will set the mark to true or false.
        Parameters:
        mark - represents if we are trying to find true boxes or false boxes in the game.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        This method will be used when ever we are reseting the game with same grid boxes.

      • setShowSolution

        public void setShowSolution(boolean showSolution)
        This method is a setter for showSolution.
        Parameters:
        showSolution - represents boolean value that if set to true will show the correct boxes if false will not.

      • gameDone

        public void gameDone()
        This method will disable the boxes after the game is done.
